attributes.action: ABOLISH THE  BENEFIT SYSTEM  AND MAKE PEOPLE GET JOBS INSTEAD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the hard working tax payer have to pay for second and third generation unemployed. We have thousands of unemployed who cant even be bothered looking for work due to lazyness and we (the tax payer) have to pay for there beer and fags. we need to scrap the unemployment benefits which would save us thousands each year and what we save can be put into the pentions fund

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
